de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features

Class GrayHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.AbstractFeatureDescriptor
      • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.GrayHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Descriptor, FeatureDescriptor

    public class GrayHistogram
extends AbstractFeatureDescriptor
    Reads the 256 bin gray histogram from the Image Processor and returns it as double[].
    See Also:
    ByteProcessor.getHistogram()

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Description copied from interface: FeatureDescriptor
        Returns a short plain Text description about the Descriptor and the semantics of the double array obtained from FeatureDescriptor.getFeatures(). May return null if no description is implemented - even though this should be avoided by any means.
        Returns:
        semantic description of getFeatures or null.
